item.title: Astro: The Modern Static Site Generator
item.description: A deep dive into Astro, a modern static site generator that offers excellent performance and developer experience.

item.description: Explore modern CSS features and learn how to write maintainable, efficient stylesheets.

item.description: A comprehensive comparison of popular CSS frameworks to help you choose the right styling solution for your projects.

item.description: An in-depth comparison of React, Vue, Angular, and Svelte to help you choose the right framework for your next project.

item.description: Learn the principles and techniques of responsive web design to create websites that work beautifully on all devices.

item.description: A comprehensive guide to optimizing web performance, from Core Web Vitals to advanced techniques.

item.description: Here is a sample of some basic Markdown syntax that can be used when writing Markdown content in Astro.

item.description: Learn how to create accessible websites that can be used by everyone, including people with disabilities.
